thread.title: McClain: Texans craving consistency from Hoyer
thread.title_full: McClain: Texans craving consistency from Hoyer

author: John McClain
title: McClain: Texans craving consistency from Hoyer
text:
October 15,   15, 2015 7:30pm Photo: Brett Coomer, Houston Chronicle What the Texans would love to get more than anything from Brian Hoyer in his second turn as the starting QB is a sense of consistency that's been lacking at the position in recent years. What the Texans would love to get more than anything from Brian... 
What the Texans need more than anything is for Brian Hoyer to provide consistency and stability at quarterback.
